articles.title: Ukraine suspends evacuation in Mariupol amid Russian shelling - CBC.ca
articles.description: What looked like a breakthrough ceasefire to evacuate residents from two cities in Ukraine quickly fell apart on Saturday as Ukrainian officials said continued shelling had halted the work to remove civilians hours after Russia announced the deal.
articles.content:
The latest: 
  • UN says more than 350 civilians killed, more than 1.45 million have fled.
  • Ukraine says evacuations halted, blame Russia for breaking ceasefire.
